document.full_text: coach guy boucher said the 41-year-old dwayne roloson is 'the guy that took us here,' so he will be in net for game 6 when the lightning try to even the best-of-seven series against the bruins.
document.title: the lightning returns to roloson
lines_and_colors: coach guy boucher said the 41-year-old dwayne roloson is 'the guy that took us here,' so he will be in net for game 6 when the lightning try to even the best-of-seven series against the bruins.
